substitution.copyText: '' Ophel. You are keen, my lord, you are keen. Ham. It would cost you a groaning to take off mine edge. Ophel. Still better and worse. '' Ham. So you must take your husbands.”

'' Would not this sir, and a forest of | '' feathers, if the rest of my fortunes turn Turk with me, with two pro- | '' vincial Roses on my raz’d shooes, get me a fellowship in a City of | '' Players? '' Hora. Half a share. '' Ham. A whole one, I. | '' For thou dost know O Damon dear | '' This Realm dismantled was | '' Of Jove himself. And now reigns here | '' A very, very—pajock. | Hora. You might have rim’d. Ham.
and written in very choice Italian: you shall see anon how the murtherer gets the love of Gonzago’s Wife.
substitution.amendedText: and writt in choice Italian: you shall see anon how the murtherer gets the love of Gonzago's Wife.

substitution.copyText: Ah ha, come, some musick: come the Recorders
substitution.amendedText: come, some musick: come the Recorders
